data.name: Office Party
data.description:
Ever wanted to be the boss of your own company and throw the best office party? It's your time! 

Make money
Furnish your office 
Hire and level up employees
Don't let them escape!

Hire as many employees as possible and earn as much money as you can to arrange the most fun corporate ever.
Work hard, party harder! See you on the office dance floor!

changelog.change_log:
Significantly reduced the number of crashes in the game

Many things optimized for better performance (materials, textures, lighting, code and some other stuff)

Redesigned visual effects

Added day-night cycle for the sky

Upgraded Target SDK version
added a toggle movement option for joysticks

Throwing items to stop employees. LITTLE SECRET companion ^_^. Employees avoiding each other insted of trying go through. Work places spawn changed in order to increase perfomance. Increased perfomance (cpu & gpu). And of course a lot of minor bug fixed
Huge perfomance update and bug fixes (cpu and gpu overall optimization, audio fixes, light correction)

added TINY conceptual changes
 made office look nicer
 and ofc fixed bugs, enjoy =)

We fixed:

- spawn of NPCs, when part of the NPCs escapes and the further purchase of NPCs upset the balance of men and women (when buying all of them, there should be equal numbers of men and woman for the correct spawn at the party level).
- saving the game (added the necessary Android permissions)
- game settings (it's no longer reset when restarting the game)
